  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected boolean checkLimitMove​(Cell nextCell, Player opponent, Worker opponentWorker)
    This method check if the movement specified by the Player (who is an opponent of the Player with Athena's power) is possible or not implementing the rule imposed by Athena's power.
    protected boolean selectedWorkerMove​(int x, int y)
    This method allow to implement the power of Athena (with checkLimitMove) saving actual and the previous z coordinates of the selectedWorker of the Player.

  • Method Details

    • selectedWorkerMove

      protected boolean selectedWorkerMove​(int x, int y)
      This method allow to implement the power of Athena (with checkLimitMove) saving actual and the previous z coordinates of the selectedWorker of the Player.

      Overrides:
      selectedWorkerMove in class Player
      Parameters:
      x - first coordinate
      y - second coordinate
      Returns:
      true if the movement was possible and performed; false otherwise

    • checkLimitMove

      protected boolean checkLimitMove​(Cell nextCell, Player opponent, Worker opponentWorker)
      This method check if the movement specified by the Player (who is an opponent of the Player with Athena's power) is possible or not implementing the rule imposed by Athena's power.

      Overrides:
      checkLimitMove in class Player
      Parameters:
      nextCell - where the opponent's selectedWorker want to move
      opponent - the opponent Player who is playing actually
      opponentWorker - the worker which the opponent want to move
      Returns:
      true if the opponent's movement is possible; false otherwise
